text: Tumhi tara allahala soduna murtici puja karita ahata, ani khotya gosti manane racuna gheta. (Aika) tumhi allaha'aivaji jyanci jyanci puja arcana karita ahata, te tara tumacya ajivikece malaka nahita, tevha tumhi allahakadeca roji (ajivika) magitali pahije. Ani tyacica upasana kara ani tyacyasica krtajnasila raha ani tyacyacakade tumhi paratavile jala
